ModMetaData.name: PrisonerRansom
ModMetaData.author: erdelf
ModMetaData.description:
This mod allows you to demand ransom for inprisoned pawns for silver at the comms console. It will give you a slight relationship boost.
Every bargain is dependant on the social skill of the handler and the faction goodwill. You can try to bargain for more money, but they will be less likely to accept.
